description: Famous Brazilian footballer, considered by many to be the greatest of all time.
name: Pele

description: Famous English goalkeeper, best known for his save from Pele in the 1970 World Cup in Mexico.
name: Gordon Banks

description: Scored six goals during the 1990 World Cup finals, including the one that put Ireland out of the competition
name: Salvatore Schillaci

description: Famous English footballer who scored a hat-trick in the 1966 World Cup final
name: Geoff Hurst

description: Italian goalkeeper. World Cup winner 2006.  Rated by Pele as one of the top 100 players of all time.
name: Gianluigi Buffon

description: German goalkeeper on the team that won the European Championship in 1996 and that was runner-up in the 2002 World Cup.
name: Oliver Kahn

description: Italian goalkeeper who is the oldest ever winner of the World Cup, having captained Italy to victory in Spain in 1982
name: Dino Zoff

description: Roger Milla played in three World Cups for the Cameroon national team, achieving international fame at the age of 38 mainly for his performances  at the 1990 FIFA World Cup where he scored four goals.
name: Roger Milla

description: German striker who is top scorer ever in the FIFA World Cup, having scored 16 goals in total. World Cup Winner 2014.  Golden Boot 2006.
name: Miroslav Klose

description: Prolific German striker who scored many memorable FIFA World Cup goals, including the one that knocked England out of the 1970 World Cup in Mexico.  World Cup winner 1974.
name: Gerhard Muller

description: Italian defender.  FIFA World Cup winner in 1982.  Considered to be one of the game's greatest defenders.
name: Franco Baresi

description: Captain of the England FIFA World Cup winning side of 1966.  Outstanding defender both for England and for West Ham, his club.
name: Bobby Moore

description: Italian defender who spent all his career (25 seasons) at AC Milan.  FIFA World Cup runner-up in 1994.
name: Paolo Maldini

description: Dutch footballer, considered one of the game's greatest defenders.  Currently the manager at AJAX (Amsterdam).
name: Frank de Boer
